content: During the call, we will make statements related to our business that may be considered forward-looking statements under federal securities laws including statements concerning our financial guidance for the second quarter and full year 2022, our growth strategy, and our plans to execute on our growth strategy, key initiatives including direct-to-consumer agency, our investments in the business, the growth levers we expect to drive our business, our ability to maintain existing and acquire new customers, our expectations regarding recovery of the auto insurance industry, our recent acquisitions, our goals for integrations, and other statements regarding our plans and prospects, and the possible impact of inflation.
